methods.name: public Builder setPendingIntent(@Nullable PendingIntent pendingIntent)
methods.comment:
* Sets an optional {@link PendingIntent} for the safety source status. * *

The action contained in the {@link PendingIntent} must start an activity. * * @see #getPendingIntent()

methods.name: public Builder setIconAction(@Nullable IconAction iconAction)
methods.comment:
* Sets an optional {@link IconAction} for the safety source status.
         *
         * @see #getIconAction()

methods.name: public Builder setEnabled(boolean enabled)
methods.comment:
* Sets whether the safety source status is enabled. * *

By default, the safety source status will be enabled. If disabled, the status severity * level must be set to {@link SafetySourceData#SEVERITY_LEVEL_UNSPECIFIED}. * * @see #isEnabled()

methods.name: public SafetySourceStatus build()
methods.comment: Creates the {@link SafetySourceStatus} defined by this {@link Builder}.
